title: Power cuts today as well
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) said yesterday the power cuts were being imposed on the request of the Ceylon Electricity Board today as well.

Groups A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K and L will experience a two-hours and 30-minute power cut between 8 a.m. and 6 p.m., whilst one-hour and 15-minute power cut will be imposed between 6 p.m. and 11 p.m.
In addition, groups P, Q, R, S, T, U, V and W will experience a one-hour power cut between 5 p.m. and 9 p.m.
